00001 loadMacros("parserUtils.pl");
00002 
00003 #############################################
00004 #
00005 #  For Parser example tables:
00006 #
00007 
00008 $BTT = MODES(TeX=>'{\tt ', Latex2HTML => $bHTML.'<TT>'.$eHTML, HTML => '<TT>');
00009 $ETT = MODES(TeX=>'}', Latex2HTML => $bHTML.'</TT>'.$eHTML, HTML => '</TT>');
00010 
00011 $BC = MODES(
00012   TeX=>'{\small\it ',
00013   Latex2HTML => $bHTML.'<SMALL><I>'.$eHTML,
00014   HTML => '<SMALL><I>'
00015 );
00016 $EC = MODES(
00017   TeX=>'}',
00018   Latex2HTML => $bHTML.'</I></SMALL>'.$eHTML,
00019   HTML => '</I></SMALL>'
00020 );
00021 
00022 $LT = MODES(TeX => "<", Latex2HTML => "<", HTML => '&lt;');
00023 $GT = MODES(TeX => ">", Latex2HTML => ">", HTML => '&gt;');
00024 
00025 $TEX = MODES(TeX => '{\TeX}', HTML => 'TeX', HTML_dpng => '\(\bf\TeX\)');
00026 
00027 @rowOptions = (
00028   indent => 0,
00029   separation => 0,
00030   align => 'LEFT" NOWRAP="1',  # alignment hack to get NOWRAP
00031 );
00032 
00033 sub ParserRow {
00034   my $f = shift; my $t = '';
00035   Context()->clearError;
00036   my ($s,$err) = PG_restricted_eval($f);
00037   if (defined $s) {
00038     my $ss = $s;
00039     if (ref($s) && \&{$s->string}) {
00040       $t = '\('.$s->TeX.'\)';
00041       $s = $s->string;
00042     } elsif ($s !~ m/^[a-z]+$/i) {
00043       $t = '\('.Formula($s)->TeX.'\)';
00044       $s = Formula($s)->string;
00045     }
00046     $s =~ s/</$LT/g; $s =~ s/>/$GT/g;
00047     if (ref($ss) && \&{$ss->class}) {
00048       if ($ss->class eq 'Formula') {
00049     $s .= ' '.$BC.'(Formula returning '.$ss->showType.')'.$EC;
00050       } else {
00051     $s .= ' '.$BC.'('.$ss->class.' object)'.$EC;
00052       }
00053     }
00054   } else {
00055     $s = $BC. (Context()->{error}{message} || $err) . $EC;
00056     $t = '';
00057   }
00058   $f =~ s/</$LT/g; $f =~ s/>/$GT/g;
00059   if ($displayMode eq 'TeX') {
00060     $f =~ s/\^/\\char`\\^/g; $s =~ s/\^/\\char`\\^/g;
00061     $f =~ s/#/\\#/g; $s =~ s/#/\\#/g;
00062   }
00063   my $row = Row([$BTT.$f.$ETT,$BTT.$s.$ETT,$t],@rowOptions);
00064   $row =~ s/\$/\${DOLLAR}/g;
00065   return $row;
00066 }
00067 
00068 sub ParserTable {
00069   my $table = 
00070     BeginTable(border=>1, padding=>20).
00071       Row([$BBOLD."Perl Code".$EBOLD,
00072            $BBOLD."Result".$EBOLD,
00073            $BBOLD.$TEX.' version'.$EBOLD],@rowOptions);
00074   foreach my $f (@_) {$table .= ParserRow($f)}
00075   $table .= EndTable();
00076   return $table;
00077 }
00078 
00079 sub Title {
00080   my $title = shift;
00081 
00082   MODES(
00083     TeX => "\\par\\centerline{\\bf $title}\\par\\nobreak\n",
00084     Latex2HTML => $bHTML.'<CENTER><H2>'.$title.'</H2></CENTER>'.$eHTML,
00085     HTML => '<CENTER><H2>'.$title.'</H2></CENTER>'
00086   );
00087 }
